=Simple callback=

The example `BoringClickAndDrag` implements a simple callback mechanism in which we:

  # Implement a simple `TerseHandling` Agent which transform [http://processing.org/reference/javadoc/core/processing/event/package-summary.html *Processing* mouse events]
  # Implement an object grabber

{{{
public class MouseAgent extends Agent {
  DOF2Event event;
  ClickEvent clickEvent;

  public MouseAgent(TerseHandler scn, String n) {
    super(scn, n);
  }

  public void mouseEvent(processing.event.MouseEvent e) {
    event = new DOF2Event(e.getX(), e.getY());
    if ( e.getAction() == processing.event.MouseEvent.MOVE )
      updateGrabber(event);
    if ( e.getAction() == processing.event.MouseEvent.DRAG )
      handle(event);
  }
}
}}}
